Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With the LedoSmart skill and Alexa,you can now interact with your LedoSmart lights,groups,and scenes via the LedoSmart Bridge.To get started,seletct the "Enable Skill" button in Alexa App to link your LedoSmart account and say, "Alexa,discover devices".

Light Controls:
- You can turn devices on/off,for example:"Alexa,turn on/off the Kitchen lights".
- You can change the brightness,for example:"Alexa,dim the Living Room".

Color Controls:
- It offers possibilities for playing with colors on color lights,for example:"Alexa,set the bedroom to purple"
- You can control shades of white,for example:"Alexa,make the living room softer"

Scenes:
You can create scenes in LedoSmart app.To control scenes,simply tell Alexa to turn on <scene name>
- "Alexa,turn on Sleep mode"

Groups:
- You can control several lights with group name,for example:"Alexa,dim All Lights".

There are two ways to define groups.
- User the name(s) you set up already in the Ledo Smart app(),OR
- Create an Alexa group and add the device(s) to the group in the Alexa App.
